content:
Here are some professional organizations that can help you stay current in the field of healthcare management:

1. American College of Healthcare Executives (ACHE)
2. Healthcare Financial Management Association (HFMA)
3. Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)
4. National Association of Healthcare Quality (NAHQ)
5. American Health Information Management Association (AHIMA)
6. National Healthcareer Association (NHA)
7. National Association of Health Services Executives (NAHSE)
8. Healthcare Information and Management Systems Society (HIMSS)
9. American Nurses Association (ANA)
10. Association for Healthcare Philanthropy (AHP)
